title: Canada Judge Issues Order Allowing Police to Remove Ambassador Bridge Protesters
sub_head: Business leaders have called for an urgent end to the blockade of the trade conduit between Detroit and Ontario
body:
A Canadian judge said he would grant police permission to forcibly remove a group of protesters who have choked off most access to a U.S.-Canada trade corridor, upending U.S.-Canada trade.
Chief Justice Geoffrey Morawetz of Ontarioâ€™s Superior Court said the injunction would take effect on Friday at 7 p.m. ET, to give protesters an opportunity to clear the area.
